articles.author: Melissa Repko, Leslie Josephs
articles.title: Companies — profitable or not — make 2024 the year of cost cuts - CNBC
articles.description: The largest U.S. companies are cutting jobs and reducing expenses as Americans pull back after a period of aggressive inflation.
articles.content:
Corporate America has a message for Wall Street: It's serious about cutting costs this year.
From toy and cosmetics makers to office software sellers, executives across sectors have announced layoff… [+10221 chars]

articles.author: Simon Kuper
articles.title: Trump's awful truth: the US can go it alone - Financial Times
articles.description: He intuits something important about Americans. Their scariest enemies are within
articles.content: One night in June 1942, a German U-boat dropped four Nazi saboteurs on a Hamptons beach. They took a train to New York, where their leader, George John Dasch, informed the FBI about them. Four other … [+4508 chars]
